hero.title:
Discover the First
Influencer Marketplace
in Morocco
hero.subTitle: in-Talks is the first Moroccan platform dedicated to digital influence, powered by Artificial Intelligence.

faq.title: Have Questions About in-Talks?
faq.description: You're in the right place. Find here all the answers to the most frequently asked questions about our platform.
faq.q1-answer: in-Talks is a Moroccan platform that connects Moroccan and international brands with local influencers. It allows companies to find, analyze, and collaborate with content creators to launch effective influence campaigns.
faq.q2-question: How to find an influencer on the platform?
faq.q2-answer: Thanks to our advanced search engine, you can filter influencers by niche, audience, engagement rate, and other criteria to find the most relevant profiles for your campaigns.
faq.q3-question: What types of brands can use in-Talks?
faq.q3-answer: All brands, whether small or large, can use in-Talks. The platform is designed to meet the needs of various sectors, from fashion and tech to beauty and more.
faq.q4-question: How does campaign management work on the platform?
faq.q4-answer: You can track and manage all your projects directly on in-Talks, from brief creation to final performance analysis. All tools are centralized for simplified management.
faq.q5-answer: You will have access to detailed statistics on influencer engagement, reach, and impact, as well as real-time tracking of your campaign performance.
